title: LET'S WORKS TOGETHER
comment: For new business inquiries contact us at

title: We are creators of content
that pursues newness that is
unforgettable.
comment: It started as a professional music video production in 2001,
and now it is expanding its business field with total contents
channel such as advertisement, movie, drama production,
overseas artist discovery, education and self-visual contents
based on various networking and image technology.

title: We eliminate
the boundaries of the creative
and present a new perspective.
comment: He has global filming experience in Asia, North America, Europe,
and has networking with leading productions and entertainment companies around the world.
We are presenting new creatives by developing skills necessary for skillful staffs,
genres and visual effects from conceptual planning through production to post
production, crossing continent, language, and cultural boundaries.

title: We lead
ever-changing trends and
technologies.
comment: Trends and technologies change day by day, but we have
used that opportunity as an opportunity. Enjoy new things,
share ideas, inspire artists,customers, and advertisers.
We continually improve and embrace new technologies,
new ways of thinking for our greatest work.

title: MEDIA
PRODUCTION
comment: We have produced over 1,000 commercial contents, more than 120 each year. From concept planning to production, directing, shooting, 2D / 3D, editing and color correction, we offer you a one-stop solution quickly.
We are showing high-level visual work with solid teamwork with professional staff in each field.
We are currently producing content with partners around the world, including in Asia.

title: GLOBAL
ENTERTAINMENT
comment: ZANYBROS. has a 50% share of the K-POP music video.

We have also signed an MOU with Korea's best record producer team and Swedish Music Publishing Company, and are expanding our business into entertainment content business including global sound recording business, differentiated visual directing, artist concept establishment, idle production consulting and training.

title: NEW MEDIA
CONTENT
comment: Mobile, and internet environments.

We also operate channels that include YouTube broadcasts, micro-movies, web dramas, and snack content through collaborative content creation with companies, entertainment content and global platform providers.

title: CREATIVE
R&D
comment: We support various productions and post production progress with technical staff with many years of experience and high-end professional equipment.

It has become the best supporter in the field of photography by providing shooting studios, lighting equipment and manpower, post-production editing, color grading, 2D & 3D graphic production, studio for photography.

title: VALUE
ADDED SUPPORT
comment: Analyze content trends and research various content creation methods.

We are planning new contents, testing new image techniques such as Virtual Reality (VR) production, drone shooting, and developing and delivering content creation system education programs for overseas creators.
